verses.verse: Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will raise <S%H5782>up<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H413>against<s%> them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H3820>midst<s%> of them that rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against me, a <S%H7843>destroying<s%> <S%H7307>wind;<s%>

And will <S%H7971>send<s%> unto <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H2114>fanners,<s%> that shall <S%H2219>fan<s%> her, and shall <S%H1238>empty<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H776>land:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7451>trouble<s%> they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her round <S%H4480>about.<s%> <S%H5439><s%>

Against <S%H413><s%> him that <S%H1869>bendeth<s%> let the <S%H1869>archer<s%> <S%H1869>bend<s%> his <S%H7198>bow,<s%> and <S%H413>against<s%> him that lifteth himself <S%H5927>up<s%> in his <S%H5630>brigandine:<s%> and <S%H2550>spare<s%> ye <S%H408>not<s%> her young <S%H970>men;<s%> destroy ye <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H6635>host.<s%>
Thus the <S%H2491>slain<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> and they that are thrust <S%H1856>through<s%> in her <S%H2351>streets.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> been <S%H488>forsaken,<s%> nor <S%H3063>Judah<s%> of his <S%H4480>God,<s%> <S%H430><s%> of the <S%H4480>LORD<s%> <S%H3068><s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H817>sin<s%> against the Holy <S%H4480>One<s%> <S%H6918><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Flee <S%H5127><s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H4422>deliver<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H5315>soul:<s%> be <S%H408>not<s%> cut <S%H1826>off<s%> in her <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> is the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H5360>vengeance;<s%> he will <S%H7999>render<s%> unto her a <S%H1576>recompense.<s%>

Babylon <S%H894><s%> hath been a <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H3563>cup<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that made <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7937>drunken:<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> have <S%H8354>drunken<s%> of her <S%H4480>wine;<s%> <S%H3196><s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H1984>mad.<s%>

Babylon <S%H894><s%> is <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> and <S%H7665>destroyed:<s%> <S%H3213>howl<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> her; <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H6875>balm<s%> for her <S%H4341>pain,<s%> if so <S%H194>be<s%> she may be <S%H7495>healed.<s%>

We would have <S%H7495>healed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> but she is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7495>healed:<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> her, and let us <S%H1980>go<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> into his own <S%H776>country:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> her <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H5060>reacheth<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and is lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> even <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H7834>skies.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> our <S%H6666>righteousness:<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> and let us <S%H5608>declare<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

Make <S%H1305>bright<s%> the <S%H2671>arrows;<s%> <S%H4390>gather<s%> the <S%H7982>shields:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath raised <S%H5782>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H4074>Medes:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> his <S%H4209>device<s%> is <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> it; <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is the <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> of his <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

Set <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H5251>standard<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H2346>walls<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> make the <S%H4929>watch<s%> <S%H2388>strong,<s%> set <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H8104>watchmen,<s%> <S%H3559>prepare<s%> the <S%H693>ambushes:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H2161>devised<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

O thou that <S%H7931>dwellest<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in <S%H214>treasures,<s%> thine <S%H7093>end<s%> is <S%H935>come,<s%> and the <S%H520>measure<s%> of thy <S%H1215>covetousness.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by <S%H5315>himself,<s%> saying, <S%H3588>Surely<s%> <S%H518><s%> I will <S%H4390>fill<s%> thee with <S%H120>men,<s%> as with <S%H3218>caterpillars;<s%> and they shall lift <S%H6030>up<s%> a <S%H1959>shout<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee.

He hath <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> by his <S%H3581>power,<s%> he hath <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> by his <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and hath stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> by his <S%H8394>understanding.<s%>

When he <S%H5414>uttereth<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> there is a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens;<s%> and he causeth the <S%H5387>vapors<s%> to <S%H5927>ascend<s%> from the <S%H4480>ends<s%> <S%H7097><s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> he <S%H6213>maketh<s%> <S%H1300>lightnings<s%> with <S%H4306>rain,<s%> and bringeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> out of his <S%H4480>treasures.<s%> <S%H214><s%>

Every <S%H3605><s%> <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H1197>brutish<s%> by his <S%H4480>knowledge;<s%> <S%H1847><s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6884>founder<s%> is <S%H3001>confounded<s%> by the graven <S%H4480>image:<s%> <S%H6459><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> his molten <S%H5262>image<s%> is <S%H8267>falsehood,<s%> and there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7307>breath<s%> in them.
They <S%H1992><s%> are <S%H1892>vanity,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H8595>errors:<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H6486>visitation<s%> they shall <S%H6>perish.<s%>

The <S%H2506>portion<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> like <S%H428>them;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is the <S%H3335>former<s%> of all <S%H3605>things:<s%> and Israel is the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of his <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is his <S%H8034>name.<s%>

Thou <S%H859><s%> art my battle <S%H4661>axe<s%> and <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war:<s%> for with thee will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and with thee will I <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms;<s%>

And with thee will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%> and his <S%H7392>rider;<s%> and with thee will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> and his <S%H7392>rider;<s%>

With thee also will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H802>woman;<s%> and with thee will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> <S%H2205>old<s%> and <S%H5288>young;<s%> and with thee will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> the young <S%H970>man<s%> and the <S%H1330>maid;<s%>

I will also break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> with thee the <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> and his <S%H5739>flock;<s%> and with thee will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> the <S%H406>husbandman<s%> and his yoke of <S%H6776>oxen;<s%> and with thee will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> <S%H6346>captains<s%> and <S%H5461>rulers.<s%>

And I will <S%H7999>render<s%> unto <S%H894>Babylon<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3778>Chaldea<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> they have <S%H6213>done<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> thee, O <S%H4889>destroying<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> which <S%H7843>destroyest<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and I will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, and roll thee <S%H1556>down<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H5553>rocks,<s%> and will <S%H5414>make<s%> thee a <S%H8316>burnt<s%> <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

And they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> thee a <S%H68>stone<s%> for a <S%H6438>corner,<s%> nor a <S%H68>stone<s%> for <S%H4146>foundations;<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Set ye <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H5251>standard<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H6942>prepare<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her, call <S%H8085>together<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of <S%H780>Ararat,<s%> <S%H4508>Minni,<s%> and <S%H813>Ashchenaz;<s%> <S%H6485>appoint<s%> a <S%H2951>captain<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her; cause the <S%H5483>horses<s%> to come <S%H5927>up<s%> as the <S%H5569>rough<s%> <S%H3218>caterpillars.<s%>

Prepare <S%H6942><s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H853>with<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H4074>Medes,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6346>captains<s%> thereof, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5461>rulers<s%> thereof, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of his <S%H4475>dominion.<s%>

And the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H7493>tremble<s%> and <S%H2342>sorrow:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> every <S%H4284>purpose<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be <S%H6965>performed<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> to <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> a <S%H8047>desolation<s%> <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H369><s%> an <S%H3427>inhabitant.<s%>

The mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> have <S%H2308>forborne<s%> to <S%H3898>fight,<s%> they have <S%H3427>remained<s%> in their <S%H4679>holds:<s%> their <S%H1369>might<s%> hath <S%H5405>failed;<s%> they <S%H1961>became<s%> as <S%H802>women:<s%> they have <S%H3341>burned<s%> her dwelling <S%H4908>places;<s%> her <S%H1280>bars<s%> are <S%H7665>broken.<s%>

One <S%H7323>post<s%> shall <S%H7323>run<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H7323>another,<s%> and one <S%H5046>messenger<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H5046>another,<s%> to <S%H5046>show<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> his <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H3920>taken<s%> at one <S%H4480>end,<s%> <S%H7097><s%>

And that the <S%H4569>passages<s%> are <S%H8610>stopped,<s%> and the <S%H98>reeds<s%> they have <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> are <S%H926>frightened.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> The <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> is like a <S%H1637>threshingfloor,<s%> it is <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H1869>thresh<s%> her: <S%H5750>yet<s%> a little <S%H4592>while,<s%> and the <S%H6256>time<s%> of her <S%H7105>harvest<s%> shall <S%H935>come.<s%>

Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> hath <S%H398>devoured<s%> me, he hath <S%H2000>crushed<s%> me, he hath <S%H3322>made<s%> me an <S%H7385>empty<s%> <S%H3627>vessel,<s%> he hath swallowed me <S%H1104>up<s%> like a <S%H8577>dragon,<s%> he hath <S%H4390>filled<s%> his <S%H3770>belly<s%> with my <S%H4480>delicacies,<s%> <S%H5730><s%> he hath cast me <S%H1740>out.<s%>

The <S%H2555>violence<s%> done to me and to my <S%H7607>flesh<s%> be <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> shall the <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H559>say;<s%> and my <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3778>Chaldea,<s%> shall <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H559>say.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H7378>plead<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H7379>cause,<s%> and take vengeance for <S%H5358>thee;<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5360><s%> and I will dry <S%H2717>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and <S%H853>make<s%> her <S%H4726>springs<s%> <S%H3001>dry.<s%>

And <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H1530>heaps,<s%> a dwelling <S%H4583>place<s%> for <S%H8577>dragons,<s%> an <S%H8047>astonishment,<s%> and a <S%H8322>hissing,<s%> <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H369><s%> an <S%H3427>inhabitant.<s%>
They shall <S%H7580>roar<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> like <S%H3715>lions:<s%> they shall <S%H5286>yell<s%> as <S%H738>lions'<s%> <S%H1484>whelps.<s%>

In their <S%H2527>heat<s%> I will <S%H7896>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H4960>feasts,<s%> and I will make them <S%H7937>drunken,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> they may <S%H5937>rejoice,<s%> and <S%H3462>sleep<s%> a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H8142>sleep,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6974>wake,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
I will bring them <S%H3381>down<s%> like <S%H3733>lambs<s%> to the <S%H2873>slaughter,<s%> like <S%H352>rams<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> he <S%H6260>goats.<s%>

How <S%H349><s%> is <S%H8347>Sheshach<s%> <S%H3920>taken!<s%> and how is the <S%H8416>praise<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8610>surprised!<s%> <S%H349>how<s%> is <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> an <S%H8047>astonishment<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations!<s%>
The <S%H3220>sea<s%> is come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H894>Babylon:<s%> she is <S%H3680>covered<s%> with the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of the <S%H1530>waves<s%> thereof.

Her <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H1961>are<s%> a <S%H8047>desolation,<s%> a <S%H6723>dry<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and a <S%H6160>wilderness,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2004>wherein<s%> <S%H3605>no<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3427>dwelleth,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> doth any <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H2004>thereby.<s%>

And I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1078>Bel<s%> in <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and I will bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of his <S%H4480>mouth<s%> <S%H6310><s%> <S%H853><s%> that which he hath swallowed <S%H1105>up:<s%> and the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> flow <S%H5102>together<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him: <S%H1571>yea,<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall.<s%>

My <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> ye out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of her, and <S%H4422>deliver<s%> ye every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H4480>fierce<s%> <S%H2740><s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
